feed.title: Homepage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: dont force lowercase URL in QuickLaunch by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3634
  • Fix: Improve error handling for Glances widgets by @mjsully and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3657
  • Feature: MySpeed widget by @gnmyt and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3662
  • Fix: Sort truenas pools by name by @marktitorenkov and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3669
  • Fix: search dropdown overlay with boxedheaders option by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3680
  • Feature: stock market service and info widget by @eldyl and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3617

New Contributors

  • @mjsully made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3657
  • @gnmyt made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3662
  • @marktitorenkov made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3669
  • @eldyl made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3617

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.2...v0.9.3

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: correct k8s service status check from v0.9.4 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3753
  • Enhancement: support pfsense v2 api by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3716
  • Feature: Frigate service widget by @j0ton in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3743

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.3...v0.9.5

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: wg-easy widget show o.filter is not a function when wg-easy api return error by @BugGeeker in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3768
  • Fix: correctly decode tab names with special chars by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3797
  • Chore(deps): Bump systeminformation from 5.22.7 to 5.23.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3799
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-prettier from 4.2.1 to 5.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3802
  • Chore(deps): Bump urbackup-server-api from 0.8.9 to 0.52.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3801
  • Chore(deps): Bump raw-body from 2.5.2 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3803
  • Change: handle errored truenas pools by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3815
  • Feature: Linkwarden service widget by @PyrokineticDarkElf and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3836
  • Enhancement: use tubearchivist stats endpoints by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3814

New Contributors

  • @BugGeeker made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3768
  • @PyrokineticDarkElf made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3836

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.5...v0.9.6

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enhancement: support ESPHome widget authentication by @juanisierra in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3846
  • Feature: DeveLanCacheUI service widget by @devedse in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3854
  • Chore: update gamedig to 5.1.2 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3876
  • Refactor: change RomM API endpoint by @InsertDisc in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3886
  • Chore: handle mealie API change by @joncrangle in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3895
  • Enhancement: customAPI size formatter by @jdevera in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3898
  • Feature: Technitium DNS Widget by @bobby-driggs in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3904
  • Enhancement: support more fields for zabbix widget by @ping-localhost in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3931
  • Enhancement: support Tdarr widget auth by @Wtfitsaduck in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3940
  • Enhancement: reliable wg-easy widget by removing custom proxy, use password header by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3966
  • Fix: jsonrpchandler requires mappings by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3970
  • Fix: other jsonrpc widgets broken in 0.9.8 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3976

New Contributors

  • @juanisierra made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3846
  • @devedse made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3854
  • @InsertDisc made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3886
  • @jdevera made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3898
  • @bobby-driggs made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3904
  • @Wtfitsaduck made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3940

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.6...v0.9.9

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: handle proxmoxbackupserver without datastore by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3979
  • Fix: Technitium widget percentage display, occasional bug by @bobby-driggs in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3984
  • Enhancement: support another ghostfolio API breaking change by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3987
  • Feature: mailcow widget by @grimsi in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3993
  • Enhancement: support pihole v6 with api auth disabled by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3995
  • Enhancement: reduce properties retrieved from mikrotik endpoint by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3996
  • Enhancement: support photoprism app passwords by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4028
  • Feature: LubeLogger service widget by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4031
  • Fix: Support Gluetun widget auth by @Tarow in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4034
  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3980
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-react from 7.35.2 to 7.36.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4050
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump tailwindcss from 3.4.10 to 3.4.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4048

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.9...v0.9.10
